column2: Oh you're the new guy right?$Ahem...$My name is Avery, and I am the mayor of this village. It is a pleasure to meet you. Please come to me if you have any questions.
EW WHAT IS THAT! I will curse you and all your ancestors for giving me this!
Listen I know pranking people is fun, but don't do it to me.
Thank you? I'm sure I'll make use of this somehow.
This is incredible! Thank you so much! It's exactly what I needed...
Don't tell Jimmy, but I've got something absolutely devious planned.
column3: Miss Sophia never lets me do what I want.
column4: Oh don't mind me, nothing to see here.
column5: School would be more fun if I were the etacher.
